title: Free Sample Detroit Red Wings Fan Pack
content:
If your a fan of the Red Wings then this free sample is for you. Not exactly sure what is in this fan pack, but if it’s any indication of the past freebies they have offered it probably is apparel and maybe some sort of swag bag. To bad tickets are not included in there. But those would probably make this deal far from a free sample.
